title: Carlos Rios
text:
Carlos Alberto Ramon Rios (born 14 April 1971) is an Argentine professional <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He currently has 53 wins and 11 losses. Rios has fought in the <a href="super%20lightweight">super lightweight</a> and <a href="featherweight">featherweight</a> division. Rios has fought for a world title on several occasions. In 1997 Rios fought <a href="Luisito%20Espinosa">Luisito Espinosa</a> for the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Council">WBC</a> <a href="featherweight">featherweight</a> title. He was defeated by <a href="technical%20knockout">TKO</a> in the 6th round.
In 1999, Rios was defeated by <a href="Floyd%20Mayweather%20Jr.">Floyd Mayweather Jr.</a> for the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Council">WBC</a> <a href="super%20featherweight">super featherweight</a> title. He later fought <a href="Acelino%20Freitas">Acelino Freitas</a> in 2000 for the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Organization">WBO</a> <a href="super%20featherweight">super featherweight</a> title. The fight ended in a <a href="technical%20knockout">technical knockout</a> after Rios' corner <a href="Submission%20%28combat%20sports%29">threw in the towel</a>.
